rules.description: right option x2 => f11 show desktop
hyper + 1 → F13(space 1 yabai),****** hyper + 7 → F19(space 7 yabai)
focus display ,hyper + ] → keypad 8(prev space yabai),  hyper + [ → keypad 7(nex space yabai) , hyper+0 -> keypad6(prev space yabai)

manipulators.description: 0x54 Command + i(keypad2)for quick entry in Things3

rules.description: VOLODIN  Hyper + h/j/k/l to Arrows and CTRL +CMD+ENTER to enter Directory in Finder
VOLODIN  Hyper+Opt+h/j/k/l -> Arrows SELECTION,  Hyper+Opt+Command+h/l  -> Select word by word
VOLODIN Hyper+Command+h,l -> Jump to left word, rigth word | Hyper+n,period -> Jump to beginStr, endStr m,comma(Jump to beginFile, endFile) to jumpword
VOLODIN Hyper+; / -> delete, backspace | Hyper+CMD+; / -> delete word, backspace word | Hyper+Opt+; / -> delete to endStr, backspace to beginStr) Deletion
Hyper Misc assign CapsLock, Hyper+` and Hyper+`+Command -> Screenshot to Desktop(Check https://github.com/Vonng/Capslock for all details)
o-mode: NEW quick open without using Hyperkey
VOLODIN Hyper App Programs and Change lang to EN when press Cmd + s
